backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, posts, comments, and likes with authorization checks using Map-based storage and access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: user profiles, post feed, likes, comments, and UI design with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including warm palette colors (coral, teal, amber).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Community Hub application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication flow, profile setup modal, and routing between login screen and feed page with header/footer.
frontend/src/components/CommentForm.tsx: Form component for submitting comments to posts with input field and send button, handling loading states.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Component displaying individual comment with author avatar, username, timestamp, and content in a rounded card layout.
frontend/src/components/CommentList.tsx: Component fetching and rendering all comments for a post with loading state and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying community icon, app title, and logout button with sticky positioning and backdrop blur.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Button component for liking posts displaying heart icon and like count with hover effects and loading state.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single post with author avatar, username, timestamp, content, like button, and collapsible comments section. Includes helper functions for timestamp formatting and username initials.
frontend/src/components/PostCreationForm: Form component for creating new posts with a textarea input and submit button. Handles post creation with loading states and clears the form on success.
frontend/src/components/PostFeed.tsx: Fetches and displays all posts using the useGetAllPosts hook. Shows loading spinner or empty state message when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup with username (required) and bio (optional) fields. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes and initializes access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddComment.ts: React Query mutation hook for adding comments to posts. Invalidates the comments query for the specific post on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePost.ts: React Query mutation hook for creating new posts. Invalidates the allPosts query on success to refresh the feed.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllPosts.ts: React Query hook that fetches all posts from the backend. Enabled only when actor is available and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile. Returns null if no profile exists and includes combined loading state from actor and query.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetComments.ts: React Query hook that fetches comments for a specific post by postId. Returns empty array when actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetLikeCount.ts: React Query hook that fetches the like count for a specific post by postId. Returns 0n (bigint) when actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserProfile.ts: React Query hook that fetches a user profile by userId. Returns null when actor is unavailable or profile doesn't exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality and identity state management. Includes provider component and hook for accessing authentication state throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikePost.ts: React Query mutation hook for liking posts. Invalidates like count and allPosts queries on success, handles duplicate like errors gracefully.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook for creating or updating the current user's profile with username and bio. Invalidates currentUserProfile query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm color palette (coral, teal, amber) for light and dark modes. Includes utility classes for brand colors and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main feed page layout displaying a hero banner image, post creation form, and the post feed in a centered container.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography settings, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a modern UI with sidebar, chart, and card components.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a community platform application with six implemented features including user profiles, post creation/feed, likes, comments, and a vibrant coral/teal themed UI with generated image assets.
